summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Forty-seventh Street from 14th Avenue N. W. to 17th Avenue N.W. in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains under Ordinance No. 19245, creating Local Improvement District No. 1852 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
